import React,{useState,useContext} from 'react' import Nav from './Nav' import {Taka,Stars} from "./Components" import axios from 'axios' import Navigation from './Navigation-ash' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import Context from './Context' const Reviewer = () => { let location = useLocation() let data = location.state let context = useContext(Context) let id = context.user || null let userid = id.user_id || null console.log(id) let url2 = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' let [star,setStar] = useState(0) let [writing,setWriting]=useState('') let pk = data.id let sender = {userid,pk,writing,star} return (

{data.name}

{data.story}

setWriting(e.target.value)} value={writing} placeholder="Write your own review" type="text" className="rev">
setImg(e.target.files[0])} type="file" multiple/>
) } export default Reviewer
